definition.name: shim-auth-id
definition.description: Enter the RSA Authentication Id for the driver. This will be the username you chose for the RSA administrative account you created for this driver.

definition.name: shim-auth-server
definition.description: Enter the RSA Connection Information used by the driver to connect to the application. e.g. t3s://amserver.example.com:7002

definition.name: shim-auth-password
definition.description: Specify the RSA password for the driver. This will be the password you chose for the RSA administrative account you created for this driver.
